examples.example: 我的同学们都很友善，我们在一起学习和玩耍十分开心。

translate.english: My classmates are all very friendly, and we are very happy to study and play together.

examples.example: 我的同学在我遇到困难时总是热情地帮助我，让我倍感温暖。

translate.english: My classmates always warmly help me when I encounter difficulties, making me feel extremely warm.

examples.example: 我的同学都积极向上，和他们相处让我充满了蓬勃的动力。

translate.english: My classmates are all positive and upward, and getting along with them makes me full of vigorous motivation.
